attributes.action: Review how Independent press standards org can make media more accountable.
attributes.additional_details: To limit miss reporting and encourage media to stick to facts when reporting.
attributes.background: Review how the Independent press standards organisation regulate the media and see if they are doing an adequate job. Check how they make the media accountable for publishing stories without enough factual information to back it up.

rejection.details:
IPSO is independent of the Government and Parliament.

You might like to sign one of these petitions instead:

Criminalise the publication of unfounded false statements by the media
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303050 

Ensure balance and fairness in political reporting
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300700 

Corrections and clarifications in UK media to be as prominent as original story
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300557
